title: Is there a way to accept judgment creditors counter offer on Notice of Opposition to Exemption before Hearing date?
question: I filed a claim of exemption offering $20 instead of 25% of wages, judgment creditor filed for a hearing against my claim, but countered that they would accept $150 monthly.
answers: Yes. Show up at the hearing! That will do it.
answer_card_text:
Answer
